input.sentences: we had a bunch of friends over to see our new place .
we hung out on the couches .
some people got more comfortable than others .
this man had something in his ear as he sat on the chair .
we all got a good laugh .
output.sentences: A whole bunch of friends gathered together to share their summer experiences.
They hung out on couches, sat on the floor and spilled outside into the warm air.
Everyone was relaxed and comfortable with their surroundings and each other.
Something was buzzing around inside and bit Matt who was sitting in the chair rubbing his ear.
He soon forgot about his ear as he noticed a group in front of him laughing at the television.
